item.Q:

to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; since; from
item.A:
dǎ
打击 (打擊) dǎjī to hit; to strike; to attack

item.Q:

highest; greatest; too (much); very; extremely
item.A:
tài

item.Q:

road; path; way; surname
item.A:
lù

item.Q:

item.A:
qǐ

item.A:
jǐ

item.A:

item.Q:
Write the character: guān
(yǒuguān de guān)
item.A:
traditional: 關
mountain pass; to close; to shut; to turn off; to concern; to involve; surname Guan
有关 (有關) yǒuguān to have something to do with; to relate to; to concern; concerning; related to
dǎzhòng struck
dǎjiāodào come into contact with; have dealing with

traditional: 打動
dǎdòng to move (to pity); arousing (sympathy); touching
dǎshǒu hitter

traditional: 打發
dǎfa to dispatch sb to do sth; to send sb away; to pass the time

traditional: 打開
dǎkāi to open; to show (a ticket); to turn on; to switch on

traditional: 打點
dǎdiǎn run batted in
yǐtài Ether-
Tàihé (N) Taihe (place in Anhui)
tàitai married woman; Mrs.; Madam; wife
tàizǐ prince
chūlù a way out (of a difficulty etc)
dàlù avenue

traditional: 對路
duìlù satisfy the need

traditional: 後路
hòulù aftersteps
lùshang on the road; on a journey; road surface
lùrén passer-by
lùzi method; way; approach

traditional: 路過
lùguò pass by or through
lùmiàn pavement
dàolù road; path; way

traditional: 開路
kāilù to open a way

traditional: 電路
diànlù (electric) circuit
yīqǐ together
liǎobuqǐ amazing; terrific; extraordinary
zàiqǐ to resurge

traditional: 對不起
duìbuqǐ I'm sorry; pardon me; forgive me
duìbùqì I'm sorry

traditional: 對得起
duìdeqǐ not to let sb down; to treat sb fairly; be worthy of
xiǎngqǐ to recall

traditional: 發起
fāqǐ to originate; to initiate; to launch (an attack, an initiative etc); to start; to propose sth (for the first time)

traditional: 發起人
fāqǐrén proposer; initiator; founding member
kànbuqǐ look down upon; despise
kàndeqǐ to show respect for; to think highly of

traditional: 看起來
kànqǐlái (idiom) looks as if (based on what is known so far)

traditional: 起來
qǐlai beginning or continuing an action; upward movement; stand up

traditional: 起動
qǐdòng to start up (a motor); to launch (a computer application)
qǐyīn cause; a factor (leading to an effect)
qǐyòng to promote; to reinstate (in a position or job)

traditional: 起點
qǐdiǎn starting point
zhījǐ to know oneself; to be intimate or close; intimate friend
zìjǐ self; (reflexive pronoun); own
bùxiāngshàngxìa equally matched; about the same
duōxiāng heterogeneous
xiāngjiāo to cross over (e.g. traffic); to intersect; to make friends
xiàngwèi phase (waves)
xiāngxìn be convinced (that something is true); believe; to accept sth. as true
xiāngtóng identical; same

traditional: 相對
xiāngduì relatively; opposite; to resist; to oppose; relative; vis-a-vis

traditional: 相愛
xiāngài to love each other

traditional: 相應
xiāngyìng relevant; corresponding (reaction)

traditional: 相機
xiàngjī a camera; variant of 照相机
xiāngjī camera
xiāngbǐ compared to

traditional: 相當
xiāngdāng equivalent to; appropriate; considerably; to a certain extent; fairly
kànxiàng fortune telling
zhēnxiàng the truth about sth; the actual facts

traditional: 長相
chángxiàng profile; portrait
zhǎngxiāng countenance; appearance; looks
zhǔrén master; host
zhǔlì main force; main strength of an army

traditional: 主動
zhǔdòng (to take the) initiative
zhǔzǐ masters

zhúyì plan
zhǔyi plan; idea; decision
zhǔjiào bishop

traditional: 主機
zhǔjī core

zhǔyào main; principal; major; primary
zhǔyāo important

traditional: 主要問題
zhǔyāowèntí main question

traditional: 主題
zhǔtí theme; subject
zuòzhǔ to decide; to make decisions; to back up sb; support
lìzhǔ advocate strongly
dìzhǔ landlord; land-owner
dàzhǔjiào Archbishop; Primate; Metropolitan

TiānZhǔ the Lord of Heaven (Christian); Catholicism; abbr. for 天主教
tiānzhǔ Catholicism

tiānzhǔjiào Catholic church
tiānzhǔjiāo Catholic church
nǚzhǔrén hostess; mistress

jiàozhǔ founder or head of a religion (possibly legendary); figure (man or God) worshipped by a religious sect; modern pop or film star worshipped by fans
jiāozhǔ hierarch

traditional: 為主
wéizhǔ as important

traditional: 當家作主
dāngjīazuòzhǔ to be master of ones own affairs
Zhēnzhǔ Allah
zìzhǔ to act for oneself; autonomous

traditional: 下關
xìaguān shimonoseki

traditional: 國家機關
guójīajīguān national agency

traditional: 大關
dàguān (reach a) critical point

traditional: 年關
niánguān end of the year

traditional: 有關
yǒuguān to have something to do with; to relate to; to concern; concerning; related to

traditional: 機關
jīguān organ; mechanism

traditional: 無關
wúguān unrelated; having nothing to do (with sth else)

traditional: 相關
xiāngguān interrelated; correlation; dependence; relevance; mutuality

traditional: 過關
guòguān pass a barrier; go through an ordeal; or pass a test

traditional: 開關
kāiguān power switch

traditional: 關中
Guānzhōng the Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, the Wei river 渭河 valley

traditional: 關心
guānxīn to care for sth; caring; concerned
